ygData.subject: RE: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: Tis only ironic to you because your mind has been clouded by the lesser so-called deity which you serve. You pathetic surface-dwelling creatures cannot
ygData.messageBody:
'Tis only ironic to you because your mind has been clouded by the lesser
so-called deity which you serve. You pathetic surface-dwelling creatures
cannot comprehend the full magnitude of Innoruuk's hate. It is for this
reason that we exist! To spread the Truth throughout the land, and to
consume those who oppose us. Our lives are a testimony to His power. We
shall rule this realm!
You will ALL die like lambs to the slaughter.

Drizben D'vorn
Loyal Servant to the Lord of All Evil, Innoruuk
Defiled Priest of Hate, Anguish and Despair

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rose [SMTP:rliu@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 3:59 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour
>
> From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
>
> What?! Are there only evil clerics here? BTW I find that contradicting.
> Evil + Cleric just seems a bit ironic.
>
> For those clerics who are not fill with hate, yes, I do believe since we
> are
> gifted with the ability to heal we should do all we can to sustain life
> over
> death. However, you should manage your manna wisely.
>
>
> Another subject:
>
> Can anyone tell me how many manna 1 pt of WIS converts to?
>
> -Imogen lvl 20 Cleric from Brell
>
